game_description: Pierhead Arcade 2 is the sequel to the popular indie Virtual Reality arcade simulator. Relive your childhood spent at the arcade on the pier but this time with unlimited tokens! Key Features *30+ unique physics driven arcade games spread over several rooms *Includes all DLC *Single player and Online / LAN multiplayer *Spend your hard earned tickets on 30+ toys in the gift shop *Customise your avatar in one of 500+ combinations Trailer Music by Dj Quads: https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads
review_1: Go to bit PERIOD ly / Biastes to find deals on tons of oculus games including this one (remove the spaces and replace the PERIOD with a .) This game is really fun, and there is so much to do. There only downside is it is still a work in progress, but if they keep working on this game it has the potential to be super super fun.
review_2: Playing games like this really makes me go back in time to my toddler days of when I played arcade games with my family! Also, I remember back in 2014, when I was with college, and we went to a holiday place that had an arcade with one of the rooms being a room where you could watch people live on stage. Fun times! Anyways, I thank you for making my childhood/collage dreams come true!
review_3: If u like arcade games this is for you get a lot out of the game considering the price. Game references unlockable and it's fun and a great game to play now and again but please don't do a me and spill cola all over Ur left hand controller I did that once and it now the middle button sticks the the games is fun and entertaining don't get me wrong but for the throwing games it's hard with my left controller
review_4: Very nice vibe carnival arcade hope more updates :)
review_5: To anyone else who is frustrated at unlocking rooms: put your hand through the PAINTING of the LIGHTHOUSE in the CLAW MACHINE ROOM. The hack works to unlock all rooms.
